data.title: Rockets forward Carlos Delfino out for remainder of playoffs with bone fracture in foot | ABC13 Houston | abc13.com
data.text:
HOUSTON

The team posted on its Facebook page that a CT scan performed Thursday revealed a bone fracture in his right foot that will require surgery this offseason.

Delfino left Game 5 in Oklahoma City in the second period after complaining of soreness in his right foot.

The Rockets host the Thunder in Game 6 tonight at Toyota Center.
